column4: Analysis: Big funds seek to rein in pay at Wall Street banks

column4: TEXT-S&P raises Spirit Realty rating to 'B'
column5: Overview      -- Spirit Realty Capital Inc. recently completed an IPO of common stock.       -- Spirit used proceeds from the IPO to repay a portion of its  outstanding term loan and extinguished the remainder of the term loan through  a conversion into common shares.      -- As a result of these transactions  we are raising the corporate credit  rating on Spirit to 'B' from 'CCC+' and withdrawing our ratings on the  company's term loan (a '4' recovery rating and 'CCC+' senior secured rating).
